DOC.brief_summary: patient receiving treatment using the osmed expander will have enough soft tissue coverage securing the bone graft which will be placed in a later stage to close the alveolar cleft.
DOC.brief_title: The Use of Self Inflating Tissue Expanders In The Treatment Of Alveolar Cleft
DOC.detailed_description: to prove that the group treated with osmed expanders will suffer no soft tissue dehiscence and will have a higher volume of soft tissue at the stage of bone grafting.
DOC.criteria: Medically free patients. Patients suffering from alveolar cleft with anterior fistulas. Age Between 7 and 13 Years Both sexes. Patients physically able to tolerate surgical and restorative procedures. Good oral hygiene. Highly motivated patients. non motivated patients
